oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slovene-English parallel corpus slenWaC 1.0
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ljubešić, Nikola
Esplà-Gomis, Miquel
Ortiz Rojas, Sergio
Klubička, Filip
Toral, Antonio
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: parallel corpus
web corpus
multilingual
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The slenWaC corpus version 1.0 consists of parallel Slovene-English texts crawled from the .si top-level domain for Slovenia. The corpus was built with Spidextor (https://github.com/abumatran/spidextor), a tool that glues together the output of SpiderLing used for crawling and Bitextor used for bitext extraction. The accuracy of the extracted bitext on the segment level is around 67% and on the word level around 68%.
